name: I'm Tired.
description:
A short game where you travel through the life of a free day when you have chronic fatigue and mental exhaustion. You never win, because there is no winning with chronic fatigue. 

National Suicide Hotline (USA): 800-273-8255

 National Suicide Hotline (Canada): 1 (833) 456 4566 

National Suicide Hotline (U.K.): 08457909090 Trevor Project Call Line (anonymous): 1-866-488-7386 

Trevor Project Text Line (anonymous): Text START to 678-678 

National Crisis Text Line (USA): Text HOME to 741741

 National Suicide Prevention Hotline in Spanish (USA): (888) 628-9454

 More hotlines and emergency numbers for other countries: https://www.opencounseling.com/suicide-hotlines

Resources for knowing the signs and how to help a loved one who may be considering suicide: https://www.suicideispreventable.org/ https://afsp.org/
